name: R2_v2_0213_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R2.v2 Purge Status Code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0213|2.8.2 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R5.
